column5: LTBR The cite misterphok notice the DoE rejection news came out right when we started holding 1 and breaking out Well done Deep State Of course sheep would call this coincidence My God America is SO fcked Why Because we have an epidemic of cognitive dissonance and normalcy bias Why do we have a massive snowflake epidemic also Because mommy daddy grandmommy and granddaddy are strung out on heroinbased happy pills walking around like theyre in an Enya video
LTBR Well the beautiful swan has become an ugly duckling again This is Lightbridge

LTBR Im wondering what is effected by the DOE rejection If there is a utility contract it doesnt make sense for that to be significantly altered since it began prior to the DOE grant existing and there are already forces in motion to produce rods but then again I dont know what the hold up has been all this time However the Nuscale relationship could be delayed by the missed grant since it is still in early stages and the lack of money resources and credibility the grant wouldve provided may delay that It may create reason for pause at Nuscale while they digest the reasons for the 2nd rejection though the 1st rejection didnt stop them from pursuing an MOU In the post rejection world Id like to see an official communication from LTBR about the rejection and renewed signs of progress sent from Framatome themselves As much as I dont want to be swindled by the LTBR moving goal post game I dont believe it is game over YET

LTBR As expected a big fat nothing from our fearless leader Fcking deaf to everything I Am preparing my proxy now for the next go round everyone out Top to bottom maybe talking out of school to Framatome might work Will try

LTBR looking at weaknesses1 applicant DOES NOT PROVIDE adequate detail Lets assume the Company really does have a utility contract in final stages of negotiation and really cant share details due to confidentiality Then once it is public those details CAN be provided in a subsequent DOE application 2 HALEU I had this same question on a previous call and failed to ask as some part of me presumed these folks know better than II imagine there will be an explanation that will address this soon enough

LTBR Time for Trump to level Montreux Switzerland on Friday and send a message that the globalist bullshit will cease ALL of it Nobody is there to play cards and sip wine They are there to decide which pasture the goy will graze for the year And it must stop now
LTBR Only a retard would sell right now or computers pushing a perception Word on the grant rejection is out priced in done Next
LTBR its kind of a stupid reason to sell just because we didnt get a grant that was never on menu

LTBR Utility demonstration with LRT of 5 would show that all is feasible and commitment Real improvements come with HALEU Stock is rangeboundlow volume without news IMO I did ask IR if there is anything prohibiting Framatome or EDF from buying LTBR stock
LTBR it will come the contract otherwise Seth is truly a jester
LTBR what a joke make some progress then dump it all back plus some
